title: Apex Legends Season 3 Live Reaction - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.27.19
description:
OK Beast takes over KFGD as Blessing Adeoye Jr. and Alex Van Aken get an Apex Legends trailer drop live on the air!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: http://www.patreon.com/ReRetroGames, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Upstart but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:22 - A New Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Trailer Just Dropped!
00:07:43 - “You know, Star Wars Fallen Order looks good…” - EJ
00:16:02 - There’s An Update on The Last of Us Part II’s Multiplayer
00:18:04 - “Do you think multiplayer will be added onto the last of us 2 after release?” - Frankfurtter
00:22:54 - There’s a Weird Pokemon Sword & Shield Livestream Announced For Next Week
00:25:48 - Mario Kart Tour smashes records on day one
00:31:03 - Capybara Games co-founder Nathan Vella is leaving the studio after 16 years
00:32:37 - Streamer With Cerebral Palsy Gets Huge Follower Boost from Borderlands 3 Community
00:37:54 - Out today
00:40:38 -  Upstart
Reader mail   -
00:42:28 - “Do you think that EA will ever support the Switch eventually within its life cycle?” - Arvel_Crynyd
00:47:19 - “Is storytelling in games the best it's ever been?” - BJ Bernardo
00:54:09 - “Logitech buying Streamlabs seems like a big deal but is it?” - Borzen00
00:56:06 - “Mortal Kombat is getting a raid mode…” - Frankfurtter
00:59:50 - Squad Up: Riley - Switch - SW-7269-0329-4206
01:01:18 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg & Tim
TUESDAY: Greg & Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg & O’Dell Harmond Jr.
THURSDAY: Greg & Imran
FRIDAY: Imran & Tim
